name: Pet of the Week – Ray
description: Meet Ray, this week's Pet of the Week! If you're looking for a lap dog who is quiet and loves to be pet by his human friends, then Ray is the perfect pup for you.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Ray, this week’s Pet of the Week! If you’re looking for a lap dog who is quiet and loves to be pet by his human friends, then Ray is the perfect pup for you. If you’re interested in adopting Ray, please visit www.SDDAC.com
